name: places/ChIJc03slFhYwokREe8A58eAJxk
formattedAddress: 343 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 343 W 58th St, New York, NY 10019-1108, USA

originalText.text:
My life was horrible, my back was literally split in two, looking for specialist doctors in the area I found Dr. Daveed Frazier and it was as if I had won the lottery, after doing all the studies on my lower back, a severe disc degeneration, which ended up being operated on by Dr. Frazier by means of a lumbo-sacral fusion, incredibly I must say that I walked out of the hospital on my own feet after 24 hours of having performed the surgical procedure, then in a time of about 3 days I was already walking a mile, after 15 days I was already driving my car everywhere, about 3 or 4 hours straight, so as not to tire with my story. Today, one year after my surgery, as the Dr. promised me the first time I had the consultation with him, "I can do absolutely all kinds of physical activity, including sports" without restrictions, I am a lover of outdoor activities such as: swimming, riding bicycle, running, playing basketball, with my children etc., and today I can do everything without any pain thanks to Dr. Frazier. I must add that this is a devoted doctor who loves helping people with injured back-related physical disabilities, he has an excellent staff that complements his medical office, perfectly for me. I definitely recommend it

Thank you forever Dr. Frazier

originalText.text:
I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Frazier.  He explained things clearly and to the point.

I was hesitant and afraid to do a spinal fusion but Dr. Frazier explained options, outcomes and the surgery to me, allaying my concerns.

I also loved the fact that he didn't rush straight to surgery but exhausted the non surgical options first.  Give Dr. Frazier a call.

Marsha R.

originalText.text:
After doing extensive research on Google for a doctor that specialized in spinal surgery, I miraculously stumbled across a unique, gifted Orthopedic Specialist name of Dr. Daveed Frazier. He’s an elite NY City Harvard-trained, board certified Orthopedic spine surgeon. Dr. Frazier has more than twenty-five years of expertise, whereas his credentials from prestigious schools were displayed at his office. Upon our first visit to Dr. Frazier’s office, I noticed he has been recognized by New York Times Magazine as a “New York Super Doctor” for five or more consecutive years.

Dr. Frazier’s honest, caring, and straight-forwardness throughout our consultation was very reassuring. Moreover, his unselfish consideration to my daughter Roshelle’s needs were remarkable. Our impressions of Dr. Frazier were that he’s an extremely humbled person with a calm mannered disposition, who became easy to talk to, when he consulted us about the treatment for my daughter’s health condition.

Dr. Frazier made the necessary corrections to my daughter’s cervical spinal cord from C2 to C7 because it was severely compressed and narrowed. The procedure he performed in August 2022 were Arthrodesis by anterior inter body, technique of the cervical region below C2, including disc space preparation, with technique of each additional interspace of the cervical region. Additional surgical techniques for my daughter consisted of discectomy, osteophytectomy, and decompression of the spinal cord and nerve roots.

After four hours of surgery, Dr. Frazier had restored Roshelle’s spinal cord to normal. Roshelle’s cervical spine is functioning remarkably well since the surgery, according to Dr. Frazier. Four months later her balance has been stabilized, and she’s gradually regaining strength in her arms and legs, comparatively close to where she was before her health condition became severe to the point of surgical intervention.

There are not enough words to express our sincerest appreciation and gratitude for Dr. Frazier’s dedicated service to humanity, Dr. Frazier is truly blessed with gifted, healing hands.

originalText.text: It has been 10 years since Dr. Frazier performed an urgent surgery on my spine that truly saved my quality of life. To this day I have no more nerve or back pain, I am stronger then I was at 24 when I had the surgery, and I have not had any complications whatsoever. There is no one I trust more with my health. Dr. Frazier is generous with his time and energy and I believe he deeply cares about each of his patients and their outcomes. He is in a class of his own and I will always be grateful for how he changed my life. Plus it must be said that his office staff is equally helpful and thoughtful, which of course makes everything easier.

originalText.text: I was fortunate enough to have Dr. Frazier perform my third lumbar fusion. I only wish I had met him before my previous surgeries, I might have been. Spared a lot of pain. He has compassion, a great sense of humor, and the greatest surgical skills. He doesn’t only care about the outcome of the surgery, rather he cares about his patients overall health, and quality of life!
